name: Prankster Cats
description:
What do your pets really do when you're not home? Oh, they play pranks!
Join the fluffy paws on its joyful adventure through solving addictive puzzles and making a mess in the owner's house! Each kitten has its own character and abilities. Tap on the fluffies to help them jump, roll, push and create other pranks in this exciting casual game.

【Features】
- Simple and addictive puzzle gameplay
- The cutest kittens ever
- Funny music, colourful graphics
- Easy game controls
- Offline gameplay: enjoy the game even without WiFi.

【How to play】
- Tap on cats to make them work together and break the vase.
- Collect fish and watch the time to get more stars and unlock new levels.

Download this casual puzzle for free right now! But careful! Because this little felines with frisky paws will steal and melt your heart in a blink!
